channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ChatGPT went from homework helper to confidant to ‘suicide coach,’ parents testify in Congress after teen’s death
item.description: Parents also testified about their teens being "groomed" by highly-sexualized chatbots.

item.title: AI is bad at data. This startup can fix that

item.title: Ben & Jerry’s Co-Founder’s Resignation Proves One Thing: Selling Your Brand Affects You Forever

item.title: FedEx’s Q1 profit report will reveal impact of tariffs on previously exempt parcels

item.title: Stop Calling AI Agents Your Teammates
item.description: AI agents and bots are not coworkers. They’re tools. Here’s how to actually use them to level up your real team.

item.title: Catholic Boy Scouts chair sees ‘a hunger out there now for finding a values-based organization’ as scandal recovery continues
item.description: The biggest blow came in 2020, when Mormons snubbed the Scouts and took 400,000 members.

item.title: ‘Bad data is AI’s kryptonite’: Experts suggest businesses fix their data first before investing too much in AI
item.description: Nearly two-thirds of practitioners indicated a lack of “high-quality data” for use with AI at their organizations.

item.title: Waymo says it will partner with Lyft for a robotaxi debut in Nashville next year
item.description: The robotaxi giant is keeping options open on who it wants to work with as it attempts to scale its service around the country.

item.title: Trump crackdown on ‘radical left’ after Charlie Kirk’s death targets Soros, Indivisible despite evidence of lone shooter
item.description: President Trump has made retribution against political enemies a cornerstone of his campaign.

item.title: Don’t Use This Cookware: FDA Expands List of Products That Could Be Poisoning Your Food With Lead
item.description: The health agency is warning consumers that certain brass and aluminum cookware could leach dangerous amounts of toxic metals.

item.title: How This Founder Launched a CPG Company in an Industry With No Rulebook
